org.gvsig.geoprocess.algorithm.base.core

Class GeometryOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gvsig.geoprocess.algorithm.base.core.GeometryOperation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AtomicDissolveOperation, BufferOperation, ClipOperation, DifferenceOperation, DissolveOperation, DissolveOperationFast, FuseOperation, FuseSpatiallyOperation, FuseSpatiallyOperation_Old, FuseSpatiallyOperationFast, FuseSpatiallyOperationFast2, FuseSpatiallyOperationFast3, IntersectionOperation, IntersectsSpatialJoinOperation, MergeOperation, ReprojectOperation, ScalableUnionOperation, SpatiallyIndexedSpatialJoinOperation, SplitLinesOperation, XYShiftOperation

    public abstract class GeometryOperation
extends Object
    Each geometry operation have to inherit from this class.

      • computesGeometryOperation

        public void computesGeometryOperation(FeatureStore inFeatStore,
                             FeatureStore outFeatStore,
                             String[] attrNames,
                             boolean selectedGeomInput,
                             boolean selectedGeomOverlay,
                             boolean closeOutStore)
                               throws DataException
        Computes a complete operation over the input FeatureStore. The result of this operation is stored in the output FeatureStore. This method will call once for each geometry.
        Parameters:
        inFeatStore - Input FeatureStore
        outFeatStore - Output FeatureStore
        attrNames - List of attributes to build the output feature store
        selectedGeom - If it is true only the selected geometries will be processed
        Throws:
        DataException

      • computesFeatureOperation

        public void computesFeatureOperation(FeatureStore inFeatStore,
                            FeatureStore outFeatStore,
                            String[] attrNames,
                            boolean selectedGeomInput,
                            boolean selectedGeomOverlay,
                            boolean closeOutStore)
                              throws DataException
        Computes a complete operation over the input FeatureStore. The result of this operation is stored in the output FeatureStore. This method will call once for each feature.
        Parameters:
        inFeatStore - Input FeatureStore
        outFeatStore - Output FeatureStore
        attrNames - List of attributes to build the output feature store
        selectedGeom - If it is true only the selected geometries will be processed
        Throws:
        DataException

      • computesGeometryOperationInAList

        public void computesGeometryOperationInAList(ArrayList<FeatureStore> inFeatStoreList,
                                    FeatureStore outFeatStore,
                                    String[] attrNames,
                                    boolean selectedGeomInput,
                                    boolean selectedGeomOverlay,
                                    boolean closeOutStore)
                                      throws DataException
        Computes a complete operation over the input list of FeatureStore. The result of this operation is stored in the output FeatureStore. This method will call once for each geometry.
        Parameters:
        inFeatStoreList - Input FeatureStore list
        outFeatStore - Output FeatureStore
        attrNames - List of attributes to build the output feature store
        selectedGeom - If it is true only the selected geometries will be processed
        Throws:
        DataException
